# zendesk_satisfaction_ratings (Data Source)

Provides a data source to query satisfaction ratings.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "zendesk_satisfaction_ratings" "all" {
}

output "ratings" {
  value = data.zendesk_satisfaction_ratings.all.satisfaction_ratings
}

output "rating_count" {
  value = data.zendesk_satisfaction_ratings.all.count
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `count` (Number) Total count of satisfaction ratings.
- `id` (String) The ID of this data source.
- `satisfaction_ratings` (List of Object) List of satisfaction ratings. Each rating object contains:
  - `assignee_id` (Number) The ID of the assignee.
  - `created_at` (String) The time the rating was created.
  - `group_id` (Number) The ID of the group.
  - `id` (Number) The ID of the rating.
  - `reason` (String) The reason for the rating.
  - `reason_id` (Number) The ID of the reason.
  - `requester_id` (Number) The ID of the requester.
  - `score` (String) The score of the rating (e.g., "good", "bad").
  - `ticket_id` (Number) The ID of the ticket.
  - `updated_at` (String) The time the rating was last updated.
  - `url` (String) The API url of the rating.
